results.title: Strategy, BitMine Stock Prices Dive as Bitcoin and Ethereum Sink
results.description: Leading crypto treasury firms BitMine and Strategy both saw their stocks plunge nearly 10% amid broader market uncertainty, as a possible U.S. government shutdown looms.

results.title: Bitfinex Bitcoin longs hit 2-year high: Is a rally to $100K possible?
results.description: Bitcoin margin longs at Bitfinex exchange reached a two-year high prior to stocks and crypto selling off sharply. Should traders expect a rally or the correction to continue?

results.title: Ethereum's Oldest Crisis Reborn as a $220 Million Security Fund
results.description: Unclaimed Ethereum from a decade-long hack will be staked and distributed to fund audits, tooling, and incident responses.

results.title: WallStreetBets Founder Cries Foul After Reddit Cracks Down on Miami Convention
results.description: Jaime Rogozinski litigated the trademark to the Supreme Court—and lost.

results.title: Google Brings Agentic Browsing to Chrome—And It's Not Playing Nice With Competitors
results.description: Google has integrated Gemini 3 into Chrome with agentic capabilities, joining OpenAI and Anthropic in the race to automate web browsing.

results.title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
results.description: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

results.title: 21Shares launches first Jito staked Solana ETP in Europe
results.description: The product offers exchange-traded exposure to JitoSOL with staking rewards embedded, as liquid staking ETFs remain under review in the United States.

results.title: Bitcoin Plunge Could Get Much Worse as Death Cross Gains Power
results.description: Bitcoin's technical setup is turning ugly, as the charts suggest bulls might want to buckle up for more pain ahead.

results.title: SEC Chair Atkins Walks Back Timeline for Crypto Innovation Exemptions
results.description: Atkins had previously said the exemptions, which could target tokenized securities, DeFi, and other crypto sectors, would be out in January.

results.title: Crypto custodian Copper weighs IPO as institutional demand grows: Report
results.description: A potential listing would further legitimize digital asset custody as core market infrastructure rather than a niche service following BitGo's public launch.

results.title: Escape Velocity raises $62M to back DePIN infrastructure projects
results.description: The raise underscores venture investors’ selective return to infrastructure-heavy crypto bets as DePIN struggles to move beyond early token launches.

results.title: Dogecoin, XRP and Cardano Hit Lowest Prices Since 2024 as Altcoins Fall Harder Than Bitcoin
results.description: Bitcoin is down bad Thursday, but Dogecoin, XRP, Cardano, and Litecoin are showing sharper losses, hitting lows not seen in over a year.

results.title: Talos adds $45M to Series B with new backing from Robinhood, Sony
results.description: The Series B extension values the New York–based crypto infrastructure company at about $1.5 billion and includes backing from institutional investors.

results.title: DePIN Tokens Lag, Revenues Rise as Sector Is ‘Forced Into Fundamentals’
results.description: Token prices across DePIN remain deeply depressed, but on-chain revenues are growing.

results.description: Bitcoin liquidations still led on the platform, but silver and gold positions also took a hard hit Thursday.

results.title: Bitcoin falls to $83.4K as gold bugs take profit and AI stocks sell off
results.description: Futures market liquidations, a sharp sell-off in US stocks and limited progress on talks to fund the US government are taking a toll on Bitcoin price Thursday. Is $80,000 the next stop for BTC?

results.title: Japan's Biggest Bitcoin Treasury Firm Just Raised $137 Million to Buy Even More BTC
results.description: Metaplanet raises $137 million for Bitcoin buys after its stock plunged 81% last year. Can the treasury firm bounce back in a crowded market?

results.title: US market regulators move to coordinate on crypto oversight
results.description: The chairs of the CFTC and SEC appeared together at a joint agency event Thursday to discuss a unified approach to crypto regulation.

results.title: Strategy Stock ($MSTR) Hits 52-Week Low As Bitcoin Craters Below $84,000
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine Strategy Stock ($MSTR) Hits 52-Week Low As Bitcoin Craters Below $84,000 Shares of Strategy ($MSTR) dropped as low as 12% today, currently trading at $140.88 and hitting a session low of $140.25. results.title: Why did Bitcoin price just hit two-month lows near $83K?
results.description: Bitcoin suddenly dropped nearly 6% to see its lowest levels in two months as gold and silver endured a snap retracement from all-time highs.

results.description: SEC Chair Paul Atkins and CFTC Chair Mike Selig spoke on CNBC on Thursday as debate continues over stablecoin yield in the CLARITY Act.

results.title: Metaplanet Raises Up to $137 Million to Buy Bitcoin and Pay Off Debt

results.title: Russia to Roll Out Bitcoin and Crypto Framework This July, Allowing Retail Participation
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine Russia to Roll Out Bitcoin and Crypto Framework This July, Allowing Retail Participation Russia wants to introduce its first regulatory framework for crypto like Bitcoin, with lawmakers aiming to finalize the draft for a parliamentary vote by the end of June. results.title: Bitcoin Price Steadies Near $90,000 as Fed Pauses Rate Cuts, Powell Signals Neutral Stance
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine Bitcoin Price Steadies Near $90,000 as Fed Pauses Rate Cuts, Powell Signals Neutral Stance The bitcoin price hovered near $90,000 as the Fed held rates steady and Powell signaled a neutral stance — neither tightening nor rushing new cuts. results.title: White House to Host Crypto and Banking Executives for Talks on Stalled U.S. Crypto Bill
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine White House to Host Crypto and Banking Executives for Talks on Stalled U.S. Crypto Bill The White House is reportedly convening banking and crypto executives on February 2 to revive stalled U.S. crypto legislation, after Senate progress on market-structure rules collapsed earlier this month. results.title: Coinbase to Join Trump Accounts Push, Eyes Bitcoin Payments for Children
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine Coinbase to Join Trump Accounts Push, Eyes Bitcoin Payments for Children Coinbase plans to join President Trump’s new Trump Accounts program by matching the government’s $1,000 child investment grant for employees’ children — potentially in Bitcoin.
